column4: Hi. I have 'guest' account with rater heavy modyfied gnome, etc. I would like to create new user with the same settings, but when I 'cp -R' guest's home, chowned it to a new user and tried to log in it didn't worked too well (it didn't at all). Any suggestions?
chown the files in the newly copied home also
Hi doctory, sorry for my english - what i meant was I did chown the new folder, or maybe...let me check.
